Description:
Detects default CSExec pipe creation

Author: Nikita Nazarov, oscd.community, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: PUA - CSExec Default Named Pipe
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where pipe_name like '%\csexecsvc%'
